737400.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night Pack 77: Steampunk 2 (Token Pack)
737400.description:
Token Pack 77: Steampunk 2

This pack contains a variety of Steampunk characters and soldiers.
This Token Pack includes:
  • 18 Soldiers
  • Allied Soldier
  • Allied Soldier Rifleman
  • Bio-Dog
  • 2 Female Human Elementalists
  • 3 Male Human Officers
  • Male Human Rigger
  • 3 Male Human Steamy
  • Male Human Swashbuckler
  • 4 Dinos
  • Female Bear
  • Female Cat Person
  • 2 Geckos
  • Male Bear
  • Male Cat Person
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
